Uses of Interface
com.stormpath.sdk.account.AccountCriteria

  • Packages that use AccountCriteria 
    Package Description
    com.stormpath.sdk.account  
    com.stormpath.sdk.application

    • Uses of AccountCriteria in com.stormpath.sdk.account

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.account that return AccountCriteria 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AccountCriteria Accounts.criteria()
      Returns a new AccountCriteria instance to use to formulate an Account query.
      AccountCriteria AccountCriteria.orderByEmail()
      Ensures that the query results are ordered by account email.
      AccountCriteria AccountCriteria.orderByGivenName()
      Ensures that the query results are ordered by account givenName.
      AccountCriteria AccountCriteria.orderByMiddleName()
      Ensures that the query results are ordered by account middleName.
      AccountCriteria AccountCriteria.orderByStatus()
      Ensures that the query results are ordered by account status.
      AccountCriteria AccountCriteria.orderBySurname()
      Ensures that the query results are ordered by account surname.
      AccountCriteria AccountCriteria.orderByUsername()
      Ensures that the query results are ordered by account username.
      static AccountCriteria Accounts.where(Criterion criterion)
      Creates a new AccountCriteria instance using the specified criterion as the first query condition.

    • Uses of AccountCriteria in com.stormpath.sdk.application

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.application with parameters of type AccountCriteria 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountList Application.getAccounts(AccountCriteria criteria)
      Returns a paginated list of the accounts that may login to the application that also match the specified query criteria.

    • Uses of AccountCriteria in com.stormpath.sdk.directory

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.directory with parameters of type AccountCriteria 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountList Directory.getAccounts(AccountCriteria criteria)
      Returns a paginated list of the directory's accounts that match the specified query criteria.

    • Uses of AccountCriteria in com.stormpath.sdk.group

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.group with parameters of type AccountCriteria 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountList Group.getAccounts(AccountCriteria criteria)
      Returns a paginated list of this group's accounts that match the specified query criteria.
